movie.title: Batman: Under the Red Hood
movie.genre: Animation, Action, Crime, Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller
movie.writer: Judd Winick, Bob Kane (Batman created by)
movie.actors: Bruce Greenwood, Jensen Ackles, John DiMaggio, Neil Patrick Harris
movie.plot: There's a mystery afoot in Gotham City, and Batman must go toe-to-toe with a mysterious vigilante, who goes by the name of Red Hood. Subsequently, old wounds reopen and old, once buried memories come into the light.
